summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE DEALER (JOE RIZZA FORD, 8100 WEST 159TH STREET, ORLAND PARK, IL 60462, PHONE: 708-403-0300) STATED THAT PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED THAT THE PASSENGER AIR BAG WAS EXPOSED AROUND THE DASHBOARD AREA. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 40,000. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.  *BF  UPDATED 8/3/18*JB
